attributes.action: Make the National Minimum Wage equal for all ages 16+
attributes.additional_details: Young people should want to work so they can get realistic work experience, building life skills. Most people will not be motivated to get up for work to only be making £5.28/hr, especially teenagers. It doesn’t make sense for young people to be paid less for doing the exact same job and usually on top of educational studies. By increasing the minimum wage, more young people will be inspired to put themselves out there and find themselves a job which would benefit the economy in general.
attributes.background: The Government should not allow 16-17 year olds to be working for less than anybody older. Increase National Minimum Wage to at least £7

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 

'To make minimum wage equal for all ages to end age discrimination for pay'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634861
